Interface AssocDao

public interface AssocDao
extends CommonDao

DAO Interface for accessing Associate related data from some external data source

                                   throws UserAuthenticationException
Authenticates the user by verifying security credntials against the RF database.

Parameters:
user - an instance of Assoc representing the user to authenticate.
Returns:
Integer wrapper representing the user's security level
Throws:
